mapper.select: SELECT l.location_id, l.first_name, COUNT(CASE WHEN LEFT(l.location_id, 2) = LEFT(s.location_id, 2) THEN 1 END) AS count FROM location l LEFT JOIN story s ON l.location_id=s.location_id AND s.user_id=19 GROUP BY l.first_name;

SELECT l.location_id, l.first_name, l.second_name, s.story_id, p.path FROM location l LEFT JOIN (SELECT story_id, location_id, create_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY location_id ORDER BY create_date DESC) AS rn FROM story WHERE user_id = #{userId}) s ON l.location_id = s.location_id AND s.rn = 1 LEFT JOIN story_photo p ON s.story_id=p.story_id AND main_photo=1 WHERE LEFT(l.location_id, 2) = #{locationId}
